verses.roman:
ei-mata vihare gaura lañā bhakta-gaṇa
raghunātha-milana ebe śuna, bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; vihare—enjoys; gaura—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā bhakta-gaṇa—keeping company with His devotees; raghunātha-milana—meeting with Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī; ebe—now; śuna—hear; bhakta-gaṇa—O devotees.
translation: The Lord thus enjoyed His life with His devotees. O devotees of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, now hear how Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī met the Lord.
